titleStmt.title: A sermon preached in Yorke Minster, before his Excellence the Marques of Newcastle, being then ready to meet the Scotch Army, January, 28. 1643. By the Bishop of Derry. Published by speciall command
titleStmt.author: Bramhall, John, 1594-1663.
Newcastle, William Cavendish, Duke of, 1592-1676.

notesStmt.note: The Bishop of Derry = John Bramhall.
Year given according to Lady Day dating.
Reproduction of the original in Jesus College Library, Cambridge.
